mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_pw, user_name, email, user_type, join_date) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{email}, 2, now())
mapper.select: select (user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_name, email, user_type, join_date, mod_date) from user where user_id= #{userId}
select (user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_name, email, user_type, join_date, mod_date) from user where 1=1
select (user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_name, email, user_type, join_date, mod_date) from user where user_id=#{userId} and user_pw=#{userPw}
